titleStmt.title: Eleutheria, or, An idea of the Reformation in England and a history of non-conformity in and since that Reformation : with predictions of a more glorious reformation and revolution at hand ... / mostly compiled and maintain'd from unexceptionable writings of conformable divines in the Church of England ; to which is added, The conformists reasons for joining with the nonconformists in divine worship, by another hand.
titleStmt.author: Mather, Cotton, 1663-1728.

titleStmt.title: Eleutheria, or, An idea of the Reformation in England and a history of non-conformity in and since that Reformation : with predictions of a more glorious reformation and revolution at hand ... / mostly compiled and maintain'd from unexceptionable writings of conformable divines in the Church of England ; to which is added, The conformists reasons for joining with the nonconformists in divine worship, by another hand.
titleStmt.author: Mather, Cotton, 1663-1728.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J.R. and sold by Sam. Philips ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Cotton Mather. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
